title: Mathematical Model and Numerical Method Selection

m.description: Bob mass (cancels in EOM, kept for energy)

model.exact_period: T = 4*sqrt(L/g)*K(sin(theta0/2)), where K is the complete elliptic integral of the first kind

integrators_selected.name: Euler
integrators_selected.description: Forward Euler method. Simple but accumulates energy drift. Used as baseline for comparison.
integrators_selected.update_rule: theta_{n+1} = theta_n + dt*omega_n; omega_{n+1} = omega_n + dt*f(theta_n)

integrators_selected.name: RK4
integrators_selected.description: Classical 4th-order Runge-Kutta. Best accuracy per step for short/medium simulations. 4 function evaluations per step.
integrators_selected.update_rule: Standard RK4 with k1-k4 slope evaluations

integrators_selected.name: Stormer-Verlet
integrators_selected.description: Symplectic leapfrog integrator. Energy oscillates but never drifts. Ideal for long-term simulations. Kick-drift-kick form.
integrators_selected.update_rule: omega_{n+1/2} = omega_n + (dt/2)*f(theta_n); theta_{n+1} = theta_n + dt*omega_{n+1/2}; omega_{n+1} = omega_{n+1/2} + (dt/2)*f(theta_{n+1})
